gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 112, Clippers 104
gameRecap.excerpt: New Orleans defeats Los Angeles, 112-104. For New Orleans, Zion Williamson led the way with 34 points, seven rebounds, four assists, and three steals while aided by Trey Murphy III (14 points, six rebounds, four assists) in the victory. Paul George finished with 26 points, five rebounds, and six assists with Kawhi Leonard adding 23 points, seven rebounds, and two blocks for Los Angeles in the losing effort. New Orleans improves to 40-26, while Los Angeles moves to 42-24 in the loss.
